definition: to dramatize historical events/novel or play on historical theme
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong 羅貫中|罗贯中[Luo2 Guan4 zhong1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, consistently portraying Liu Bei's Shu Han 劉備|刘备, 蜀漢|蜀汉 as virtuous heroes and Cao Cao's Wei 曹操, 魏 as tyrannical villains

Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc
Dramatized history of successive dynasties (from Han to Republican China) by Cai Dongfan 蔡東藩|蔡东藩
pinyin: li4 chao2 tong1 su2 yan3 yi4

definition: Dramatized history of Republican China until 1927 by Cai Dongfan 蔡東藩|蔡东藩, and later chapters by Xu Qinfu 許廑父|许廑父
pinyin: Min2 guo2 tong1 su2 yan3 yi4

definition: Dramatized History of Sui and Tang, novel by Qing dynasty author Chu Renhuo 褚人獲|褚人获[Chu3 Ren2 huo4]

sentences.english: " The romance of the Three Kingdoms " in figure on each side of its state, long or short.
sentences.chinese: 《三国演义》中的人物各具其态，有长有短。

sentences.english: My favorite book is the romance of The Three Kingdoms by luo guanzhong in Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜爱的书是明代罗贯中所著《三国演义》了。

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 讲史平话与《三国演义》成书的关系十分密切。

sentences.english: Some teachers even ask little children to read Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 有的老师甚至叫小孩子去读《三国演义》。

sentences.english: Mr. Er Yuehe is a celebrated novelist on Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 二月河先生是一位清史演义题材的著名小说家。

sentences.english: The acknowledgement of the edition of The Historical Romance of Three Kingdoms established Luo Guanzhong's copyright.
sentences.chinese: 《三国志演义》版本的题署，确定了罗贯中的著作权。

sentences.english: The game was designed with the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms in mind.
sentences.chinese: 这款游戏的设计理念源自小说《三国演义》。

sentences.english: The lengthy historical novel" the Romance of the Three Kingdoms" inside, displays obviously censures Cao.
sentences.chinese: 长篇历史小说《三国演义》里面，表现出明显的贬曹。

sentences.english: Tentative analysis of ambitious scoundrel Caocao figure in Romance of the Three kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 试析三国演义里曹操的奸雄形象。

sentences.english: That day you were reading the Chinese classics "Romance of the 3 kingdom".
sentences.chinese: 那一天你在读中国古典名著三国演义。

definition: Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong 羅貫中|罗贯中[Luo2 Guan4 zhong1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, consistently portraying Liu Bei's Shu Han 劉備|刘备, 蜀漢|蜀汉 as virtuous heroes and Cao Cao's Wei 曹操, 魏 as tyrannical villains
Luo Guanzhong (c. 1330-c. 1400), author of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms and other works
the 24 or 25 official dynastic histories/true history, as opposed to fictional adaptation or popular legends
History of the Three Kingdoms, fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Chen Shou 陳壽|陈寿[Chen2 Shou4] in 289 during Jin Dynasty 晉朝|晋朝[Jin4 chao2], 65 scrolls
edge of the water/shore or sea, lake or river/seashore
Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh by Shi Nai'an 施耐庵[Shi1 Nai4 an1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature
courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
"The Story of Yue Fei", biography of Song dynasty patriot and general Yue Fei 岳飛|岳飞[Yue4 Fei1]
Western Jin dynasty 西晋 historian, author of History of the Three Kingdoms 三國志|三国志
courtesy name of 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3]

Battle of Redcliff of 208 at Chibi in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区 of Huanggang city 黄冈, a decisive defeat of Cao Cao 曹操 at the hands of southern kingdom of Wu/famous episode in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义
Dramatized History of Sui and Tang, novel by Qing dynasty author Chu Renhuo 褚人獲|褚人获[Chu3 Ren2 huo4]
Lü Bu (-198), general and warlord
Zhao Yun (-229), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Oath of the Peach Garden, sworn by Liu Bei 劉備|刘备[Liu2 Bei4], Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞[Zhang1 Fei1] and Guan Yu 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3] at the start of the Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]

Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc
